name: An adventure on Demand
description:
This is an one-player game, you will control the player to explore around and find out the treasures on this Imaginary game world.  Sailing the boat, firing the bomb, finding the key proceed to the next story are the way of storytelling for this game.
Please be brave to sail away and puzzle all the challenges you are going to face.

Actions: Up/Down/Left/Right to control the player; R to Reset; Z to Undo

Source Code Avaliable Here: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=7d627170dc9dcbb82c71b21e49b334de
